scan_column_type_check.description: A source code comment containing "TODO" (and other typical patterns) indicates unfinished work or unaltered template code. When an application version is baselined, such cases whould be resolved.
scan_column_type_check.name: CodeSanity - Comment containing "TODO"
scan_column_type_check.resolution_details: Finish the unfinished work and/or modify template code so that the reason for the "TODO" comment is resolved.
scan_column_type_check.short_description: Source code comments should not contain "TODO"
